What to look for

Correctness & failure handling

Boundaries: IO, retries, timeouts

Simplicity: fewer concepts > clever code

Security & privacy handling

Tests: meaningful & sufficient

How to comment

Prefer questions over mandates: “What do you think about…”

Suggest concrete changes with diffs.

Batch comments; avoid bikeshedding nits.

Approvals

2 approvals for risky areas, otherwise 1.

Author merges after green checks & approvals.
